casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Elgin Orlandas HART. No. 446A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Staples Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Hart. Lisa Y. Harper, Assistant Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2006 by Michelle F. Lynch for Leave to Withdraw as Counsel Due to Medical Condition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
